definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Democratic centralism is another of our advantages.
sentences.chinese: 再如民主集中制也是我們的優越性。

sentences.english: The organs of self-government of national autonomous areas shall apply the principle of democratic centralism.
sentences.chinese: 民族自治地方的自治機關實行民主集中制的原則。

sentences.english: Part 5 describes the historical limitations of the Ideas of Five Powers Charter.
sentences.chinese: 此外，五權憲法思想還體現了樸素的民主集中制原則。

sentences.english: Adhere to the principle of democratic centralism; do not act arbitrarily or stay feeble and lax.
sentences.chinese: 堅持和健全民主集中制，增強黨的活力和團結統一。

sentences.english: "Summary" of Marx and Engels had never advocated the principle of democratic centralism .
sentences.chinese: 馬克思恩格斯從未倡導過民主集中制原則。

sentences.english: The Constitution also provides that the organs of state must practise democratic centralism.
sentences.chinese: 憲法還規定國家機關應實行民主集中制。

sentences.english: The Constitution also provides that the organs of state must practise democratic centralism .
sentences.chinese: 憲法還規定，國家機關應實行民主集中制。

sentences.english: Democratic centralism is the cardinal organizational principle of the Party and the leading system.
sentences.chinese: 民主集中制是黨的根本組織原則和領導制度。

sentences.english: The organizational principle of the apk is democratic centralism.
sentences.chinese: 丹共的組織原則是民主集中制。

sentences.english: Adhere to and improve democratic centralism and enhance the Party's vitality, solidarity and unity.
sentences.chinese: 堅持和健全民主集中制，增強黨的活力和團結統一。

sentences.english: Emphasis must be placed on democratic centralism and iron-like discipline stipulated on the basis of high awareness.
sentences.chinese: 必須強調民主集中制和在高度自覺基礎上的鐵的紀律。

definition: the mass line, CCP term for Party policy aimed at broadening and cultivating contacts with the masses
Scientific Outlook on Development, a guiding principle for the CCP attributed to Hu Jintao 胡錦濤|胡锦涛[Hu2 Jin3 tao1], incorporated into the Constitution of the CCP in 2007

pinyin: ren2 min2 min2 zhu3 zhuan1 zheng4

definition: to rule according to the law
within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
On the correct handling of internal contradictions among the people, Mao Zedong's tract of 1957
pinyin: zheng4 que4 chu3 li3 ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4
related.word: 正確處理人民內部矛盾

definition: the Three Represents enunciated by Jiang Zemin 江澤民|江泽民 as the duty of the Chinese Communist party in 2001, namely: to represent productivity of an advanced society, forward progress of advanced culture and the fundamental interests of the people
